channel.title: PROBlem
channel.description: Ok, Well I usually cannot connect to my server, but I went into options and changed the automatic connections and now I can log on but noone else can... I am portfowarded, I HAVE TRIED EVERYTHING PLEASE HELP!? WILL ++REP

item.title: PROBlem
item.dc:creator: @Tenacious_T Tenacious T
item.description:
@Tenacious_T wrote:

James, yes I updated it on the router, and on no-ip. See what the option that I chose does, is it hosts the no-ip from my ROUTERS IP 192.169.1.120… and noone else can connect… but i took that option off.

Zuno no, You never gave me any details on what you want.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Zuno wrote:

Tenacious! Did you ever make my sig?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2008, 11:33:09 AM[/size][hr]Download the DUC from no-ip.com and then update your servers ip it should work just fine
